keystone noun [C]
(STONE)
Add to word list

architecture
  specialized the middle stone in the top of an arch that has a special shape and holds all the other stones in position

keystone noun [C]
(IMPORTANT PART)
the most important part of a plan, idea, etc. on which everything else depends

Add to word list
Add to word list
the most important part of a plan, idea, etc. on which everything else depends: Selling overseas has been, and always will remain, one of the keystones of our national prosperity. A keystone of its corporate strategy is to invest in people, technology, and training to create a brand.
